name: Make IT Online
description:
Make IT Online is a  Hungarian web development company based in Budapest, focusing on custom  online solutions and web developments!
Mainly we have 4 service to provide:
1. Design: Logo, Branding, Print Design, Web design, UI, UX, App design
2. Web Development: Business Website development, eCommerce solutions, CRM, ERP
3. Mobile App Development: iOS, Android and Cross Platform development
4. Online marketing, Digital Strategy: Facebook Campaign management, AdWords management, SEO, LinkBuilding

50% of our developments are delivered abroad, usually Austria, UAE, UK, Australia. 
However our HQ is in Budapest we have strong ties and partnerships in UK, London, UAE, Dubai, USA, Florida with our satellite offices.
